xxl.core.io.raw

Class TesterRawAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.io.raw.DecoratorRawAccess
      • xxl.core.io.raw.TesterRawAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RawAccess, Decorator<RawAccess>

    public class TesterRawAccess
extends DecoratorRawAccess
    Tests a RawAccess by writing the data to a second control raw access. After each read operation, the data is compared between the original raw access and the control raw access (in main memory).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected RAMRawAccess testerRA
      Internally used control raw access to store the data a second time.

      • Fields inherited from class xxl.core.io.raw.DecoratorRawAccess

        ra

    • Constructor Detail

      • TesterRawAccess

        public TesterRawAccess(RawAccess ra,
                       long size)
        Constructs a new tester for a RawAccess.
        Parameters:
        ra - The RawAccess to be tested.
        size - Number of sectors which are reserved for the storage of the control raw access. -1 means the same size than the original raw access.

    • Method Detail

      • write

                  long sector)
           throws RawAccessException
        Writes a sector of a characteristic length to the file/device.
        Specified by:
        write in interface RawAccess
        Overrides:
        write in class DecoratorRawAccess
        Parameters:
        block - byte array which will be written to the sector
        sector - number of the sector in the file/device where the block will be written
        Throws:
        RawAccessException - a specialized RuntimeException
